name: CreateAsanaPortfolio
description:
Create a new portfolio in an Asana workspace.

Use this tool to create a new portfolio in a specific Asana workspace with a supplied name. Note that this API does not automatically add states like 'Priority' that might be present in portfolios created through the Asana UI.

parameters.name: portfolio_data
parameters.description: JSON object representing the portfolio to create, including name and additional settings.

parameters.name: include_optional_fields
parameters.description: List the optional properties to include in the response, such as ['name', 'members'].
